title: Great Wall decorated in autumn colors in Hebei
text:
Photo taken on October 21 shows a section of the Great Wall in Zhucaoying town, Qinhuangdao, North China's Hebei province, that has become even more spectacular when decorated with colorful plants from neighboring mountains.[Photo by Cao Jianxiong/For chinadaily.com.cn]

A section of the Great Wall in Zhucaoying town, Qinhuangdao, North China's Hebei province has become even more spectacular after being decorated by colorful plants from neighboring mountains.

In autumn, red, green and yellow tree leaves together with the Great Wall make for picturesque scenery on the mountains.
